title: Consistency Is KEY
description:
Linda and Emily start off this week's Thanksgiving episode with a look around the league including Dallas Stars' Jason Robertson's take on Brussels sprouts. After that, they highlight some of the games they're looking forward to over Thanksgiving weekend before Emily tells us about her day with Jack Hughes and Ty Smith. The ladies wrap up with a discussion on favorite Thanksgiving dishes!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
